item.title: META
item.description: score:29 Chances: Meta Platforms is set to receive initial shipments of Nvidia’s new flagship artificial intelligence chip, which could potentially improve the company’s AI capabilities and drive future growth. The reemergence of Facebook’s “poke” feature may attract a younger demographic, indicating potential for increased user engagement and growth.
